title: Untamed
description: TWO MARKS PACK RULE: ALWAYS COUPLE AS TWO.I caught their smell while I was out doing my job as an enforcer.Knew she had to be the one.I came back with my alpha.Because our bloodline always mates in pairs.Two men for every she-wolf. Two daddies for our mate.The one we will pamper and protect. Spank and devour.Which we will carry away to start a family with her.As soon as we have convinced her that she belongs to us.Available ONLY in the Dirty Daddies Anthology!
author: Renee Rose
